text: Werner Klumpp (12 November 1928 - 8 January 2021) was a German politician. He was a German politician of the FDP. After the death of Franz-Josef Röder he was the interim Minister President of the Saarland from 26 June 1979 to 5 July 1979.http://www.deutschland-auf-einen- blick.de/politik/ministerpraesidenten/saarland.php He was born in Baiersbronn, Baden-Württemberg. Klumpp died on 8 January 2021, aged 92.Im Alter von 92 Jahren : FDP-Politiker Werner Klumpp gestorben (in German) Saarbrücker Zeitung 9 January 2021 ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Politicians from Saarland Category:Politicians of the Free Democratic Party of Germany
title: Werner Klumpp
